champions.name: Karthus
champions.abilityDesc: Karthus deals damage to a number of random enemies after a long channel

champions.name: Kha'Zix
champions.abilityDesc: Kha'Zix slashes the closest enemy, dealing bonus damage to enemies that are alone

champions.name: Anivia
champions.abilityDesc: Anivia channels a large hailstorm, damaging and slowing the attack speed of enemies inside of it

champions.name: Rek'Sai
champions.abilityDesc: Rek'Sai burrows for a short duration becoming untargetable and healing. When Rek'Sai unburrows she deals damage and knocks up the closest enemy

champions.name: Evelynn
champions.abilityDesc: Evelynn deals damage to the 3 closest enemies and teleports away. Damage is increased against low health enemies

champions.name: Shen
champions.abilityDesc: Shen creates a zone around himself, allowing allies inside to dodge all attacks

champions.name: Mordekaiser
champions.abilityDesc: Mordekaiser slams his mace in front him, dealing damage to two enemies in a line

champions.name: Kennen
champions.abilityDesc: Kennen summons a storm around him, dealing damage and stunning enemies inside of it

champions.name: Akali
champions.abilityDesc: Akali throws shurikens in front of her, dealing damage

champions.name: Lulu
champions.abilityDesc: Lulu grants an ally bonus Health, knocking up enemies near them

champions.name: Rengar
champions.abilityDesc: Rengar leaps to the weakest enemy, gaining Attack Speed and Critical Strike Chance

champions.name: Graves
champions.abilityDesc: Graves' attacks deal increased damage and hit all enemies in front of him

champions.name: Swain
champions.abilityDesc: Swain transforms, draining health from all nearby enemies. At the end of his transformation, Swain sends out a burst of energy dealing damage to nearby enemies

champions.name: Sejuani
champions.abilityDesc: Sejuani creates a large glacial storm, stunning enemies within it after a short delay

champions.name: Shyvana
champions.abilityDesc: Shyvana dashes and transforms, gaining Attack Damage and Attack Range. When transformed, her attacks set enemies on fire

champions.name: Blitzcrank
champions.abilityDesc: Blitzcrank pulls the furthest enemy to him and knocks them up

champions.name: Pyke
champions.abilityDesc: Pyke dashes behind the furthest enemy, creating an afterimage that stuns enemies it passes through

champions.name: Ashe
champions.abilityDesc: Ashe fires an arrow that stuns and damages the farthest enemy. The stun is longer the farther the enemy

champions.name: Aatrox
champions.abilityDesc: Aatrox cleaves the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemies inside it

champions.name: Ahri
champions.abilityDesc: Ahri fires an orb in a line that returns to her, damaging enemies it passes through

champions.name: Kindred
champions.abilityDesc: Kindred creates a zone around herself that prevents allies from dying

champions.name: Volibear
champions.abilityDesc: Volibear empowers his attacks to chain between enemies, applying on-hit effects

champions.name: Leona
champions.abilityDesc: Leona calls down a solar ray that damages and slows enemies inside it. The enemy in the center is stunned

champions.name: Zed
champions.abilityDesc: Zed throws a shuriken, dealing damage to enemies in a line

champions.name: Tristana
champions.abilityDesc: Tristana places a bomb on her current target that detonates after 3 attacks, damaging nearby enemies

champions.name: Elise
champions.abilityDesc: Elise summons Spiderlings and transforms, gaining Lifesteal

champions.name: Nidalee
champions.abilityDesc: Nidalee heals herself and the weakest ally, then transforms gaining Attack Damage

champions.name: Vayne
champions.abilityDesc: Vayne deals bonus true damage every third attack based on the enemy's maximum health

champions.name: Morgana
champions.abilityDesc: Morgana fires chains to nearby enemies, dealing damage and stunning after a short delay if they are still nearby

champions.name: Aurelion Sol
champions.abilityDesc: Aurelion Sol breathes a large blast of fire in a line, dealing damage to enemies

champions.name: Cho'Gath
champions.abilityDesc: Cho'gath ruptures an area, stunning and damaging enemies inside of it

champions.name: Brand
champions.abilityDesc: Brand launches a bouncing fireball, damaging enemies hit

champions.name: Braum
champions.abilityDesc: Braum gains a barrier that blocks incoming damage

champions.name: Lucian
champions.abilityDesc: Lucian dashes away to safety and attacks an enemy twice, once with Attack Damage and once with Spell Damage

champions.name: Twisted Fate
champions.abilityDesc: Twisted Fate throws a card that randomly stuns (Gold), deals damage around his target (Red), or restores mana to himself and nearby allies (Blue)

champions.name: Gnar
champions.abilityDesc: Gnar transforms, gaining Health, Attack Damage and jumping behind the furthest enemy, damaging and stunning enemies nearby

champions.name: Fiora
champions.abilityDesc: Fiora becomes immune to damage and spells. After a short delay, she stuns and damages the closest enemy

champions.name: Veigar
champions.abilityDesc: Veigar blasts an enemy with magical energy, dealing damage. This spell instantly kills if the enemy is a lower star level than Veigar

champions.name: Gangplank
champions.abilityDesc: Gangplank periodically creates barrels. On cast, Gangplank detonates the barrels, damaging nearby enemies

champions.name: Darius
champions.abilityDesc: Darius swings his axe, damaging nearby enemies and healing himself based off enemies hit

champions.name: Katarina
champions.abilityDesc: Katarina channels and fires daggers at a number of nearby enemies, dealing damage and reducing healing

champions.name: Garen
champions.abilityDesc: Garen spins his sword around, becoming immune to magic damage and dealing damage to nearby enemies

champions.name: Lissandra
champions.abilityDesc: Lissandra encases the target in ice, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Below half HP, Lissandra instead encases herself, becoming untargetable

champions.name: Poppy
champions.abilityDesc: Poppy swings her hammer, damaging and knocking up the closest enemy

champions.name: Warwick
champions.abilityDesc: Warwick pounces onto the lowest health enemy, stunning and damaging them while healing himself

champions.name: Kayle
champions.abilityDesc: Kayle shields the weakest ally, making them immune to damage

champions.name: Varus
champions.abilityDesc: Varus charges and fires an arrow, dealing damage to all enemies in a line

champions.name: Yasuo
champions.abilityDesc: Yasuo stabs forward, damaging two enemies in a line. On third cast, Yasuo instead launches a tornado dealing damage and knocking up enemies in a line

champions.name: Kassadin
champions.abilityDesc: Kassadin's attacks steal mana from enemies, converting it into a shield

champions.name: Miss Fortune
champions.abilityDesc: Miss Fortune channels and fires several waves of bullets damaging enemies in a cone

champions.name: Draven
champions.abilityDesc: Draven gains Spinning Axes, dealing bonus on-hit damage. Stacks up to two times

traits.name: Robot
traits.desc: (@MinUnits@) Robots start combat at full mana

traits.name: Glacial
traits.desc:
Attacks from Glacials have a chance to stun for @StunDuration@s

(@MinUnits@) @ProcPercent@% Chance to Stun
(4) 35% Chance to Stun
(6) 45% Chance to Stun

traits.name: Knight
traits.desc:
Your team ignores damage from all sources

(@MinUnits@) @BlockAmount@ Damage Blocked
(4) 30 Damage Blocked
(6) 55 Damage Blocked

traits.name: Noble
traits.desc:
+@Armor@ Armor & Magic Resist and heal @Heal@ health per attack

(3) 1 Random Ally
(6) All Allies

traits.name: Exile
traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain a shield equal to @ShieldPercent@% of their maximum health</row>

traits.name: Elementalist
traits.desc:
Elementalists gain double mana from attacks

(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, summon a Golem

traits.name: Demon
traits.desc:
Attacks from Demons have a chance to burn all of an enemy's mana and deal that much true damage

(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% Chance to Mana Burn
(4) 35% Chance to Mana Burn
(6) 60% Chance to Mana Burn

traits.name: Shapeshifter
traits.desc:
Shapeshifters gain bonus maximum Health when they transform

(@MinUnits@) @HPPercent@% Bonus Maximum Health

(6) 120% Bonus Maximum Health

traits.name: Ninja
traits.desc:
The Ninja Trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 Ninjas

(1) Ninja gains 40 AD & AP
(4) All Ninjas gain 60 AD & AP

traits.name: Dragon
traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Dragons are immune to 83% of Magic damage</row>

traits.name: Void
traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Void units deal True Damage</row>

traits.name: Sorcerer
traits.desc:
Sorcerers gain double mana from attacking

Allies have increased spell damage

(3) +@AP@% Spell Damage
(6) +100% Spell Damage

traits.name: Wild
traits.desc:
Attacks generate stacks of Fury (stacks up to 5 times). Each stack of Fury gives @AttackSpeedPercent@ Attack Speed

(2) Wild Allies Only
(4) All Allies

traits.name: Guardian
traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, adjacent allies receive +@Armor@ Armor</row>

traits.name: Brawler
traits.desc:
Brawlers receive bonus maximum health

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ Bonus Health
(4) 700 Bonus Health
(6) 1200 Bonus Health

traits.name: Ranger
traits.desc:
Rangers have a chance to double their attack speed every @ProcRate@s for the next @ProcRate@s

(@MinUnits@) @ProcPercent@% Chance to Double Attack Speed
(4) 65% Chance to Double Attack Speed

traits.name: Imperial
traits.desc:
Imperials deal Double Damage

(2) 1 Random Imperial
(4) All Imperials

traits.name: Blademaster
traits.desc:
Blademasters have a @ProcChance@% chance to strike additional times each attack

(3) One Additional Strike
(6) Two Additional Strikes
(9) Four Additional Strikes

traits.name: Pirate
traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Earn up to 4 additional gold after combat against another player</row>

traits.name: Gunslinger
traits.desc:
After attacking, Gunslingers have a @ProcPercent@% chance to fire additional attacks

(2) Attack another random enemy
(4) Attack two random enemies
(6) Attack three random enemies

traits.name: Phantom
traits.desc: <row>(@MinUnits@) Curse a random enemy at the start of combat, setting their HP to @HPToSet@</row>

traits.name: Assassin
traits.desc:
Assassins leap to the farthest enemy at the start of combat

Assassins deal additional Critical Strike Damage

(@MinUnits@) +@CritAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Damage
(6) +350% Critical Strike Damage

traits.name: Yordle
traits.desc:
Attacks against ally Yordles have a chance to miss (Also dodges On-hit effects)
(@MinUnits@) @MissPercent@% Chance to Miss
(6) 55% Chance to Miss

items.name: B. F. Sword
items.desc: +@AD@ Attack Damage

items.name: Recurve Bow
items.desc: +@AS@% Attack Speed

items.name: Needlessly Large Rod
items.desc: +@AP@% Spell Damage

items.name: Tear of the Goddess
items.desc: +@Mana@ Mana

items.name: Chain Vest
items.desc: +@Armor@ Armor

items.name: Negatron Cloak
items.desc: +@MagicResist@ Magic Resist

items.name: Giant's Belt
items.desc: +@Health@ Health

items.name: Spatula
items.desc: It must do something...

items.name: Infinity Edge
items.desc: Critical Strikes deal +@CriticalStrikeAmp@% damage

items.name: Sword of the Divine
items.desc: Each second, the wearer has a @ChanceToProc@% chance to gain 100% Critical Strike

items.name: Hextech Gunblade
items.desc: Heal for @OmniVamp@% of all damage dealt

items.name: Spear of Shojin
items.desc: After casting, wearer gains @ManaPercentRestore@% of its max mana per attack

items.name: Guardian Angel
items.desc: Wearer revives with @HealthRestore@ Health

items.name: The Bloodthirster
items.desc: Attacks heal for @LifeSteal@% of damage

items.name: Zeke's Herald
items.desc: Grants +@AttackSpeed@% attack speed to champions two spaces to the left and right of the wearer

items.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
items.desc: Wearer is also an Assassin

items.name: Rapid Firecannon
items.desc: Wearer's attacks cannot be dodged. Attack Range is doubled

items.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
items.desc: Attacks grant @AttackSpeedPerStack@% Attack Speed.  Stacks infinitely

items.name: Statikk Shiv
items.desc: Every 3rd attack deals @Damage@ splash magical damage

items.name: Phantom Dancer
items.desc: Wearer dodges all Critical Strikes

items.name: Cursed Blade
items.desc: Attacks have a low chance to Shrink (Reduce enemy's star level by 1)

items.name: Titanic Hydra
items.desc: Attacks deal @MaxHealth@% of the wearer's max Health as splash damage

items.name: Blade of the Ruined King
items.desc: Wearer is also a Blademaster

items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
items.desc: Wearer's Spell Damage stat is amplified by @APPercentAmp@%

items.name: Luden's Echo
items.desc: Spells deal @Damage@ splash damage on hit

items.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
items.desc: On start of combat, the wearer and the champions two spaces to the left and right of the wearer gain a shield of @ShieldValue@ for 4 seconds

items.name: Ionic Spark
items.desc: Whenever an enemy casts a spell, they take @Damage@ true damage

items.name: Morellonomicon
items.desc: Spells deal burn damage equal to @BurnPercent@% of the enemy's maximum health per second

items.name: Yuumi
items.desc: Wearer is also a Sorcerer

items.name: Seraph's Embrace
items.desc: Regain @ManaRestore@ mana each time a spell is cast

items.name: Frozen Heart
items.desc: Adjacent enemies lose @AttackSpeedSlow@% Attack Speed

items.name: Hush
items.desc: Attacks have a high chance to Silence an unit for 3 seconds

items.name: Redemption
items.desc: On 25% health, heal all nearby allies for @HealthRestore@ Health

items.name: Darkin
items.desc: Wearer is also a Demon

items.name: Thornmail
items.desc: Reflect @DamageReflect@% of physical damage mitigated as true damage

items.name: Sword Breaker
items.desc: Attacks have a chance to disarm

items.name: Red Buff
items.desc: Attacks deal @BurnPercent@% burn damage

items.name: Knight's Vow
items.desc: Wearer is also a Knight

items.name: Dragon's Claw
items.desc: Gain @MagicReduction@% resistance to magic damage

items.name: Zephyr
items.desc: On start of combat, banish an enemy for @BanishDuration@ seconds

items.name: Runaan's Hurricane
items.desc: Attacks target @AdditionalTargets@ additional enemies. These additional attacks deal @DamagePenalty@% damage and applies on-hit effects

items.name: Warmog's Armor
items.desc: Wearer regenerates @HealthRegen@% missing Health per second

items.name: Frozen Mallet
items.desc: Wearer is also a Glacial

items.name: Force of Nature
items.desc: Gain +@MaxArmySizeIncrease@ team size
